body.name: Notebuddy Mini Portable Printer, Bluetooth Smart Pocket Inkless Thermal Printer with 5 Roll Papers for Journal/DIY Scrapbook/Travel/Notes/Lists/Label/Memo, Receipt Printer for iOS&Android
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 2 hrs 45 mins
features: [Multi-Function Pocket Printer-Print Now] This inkless pocket printer is ideal for printing black and white pictures/photos, memos, shopping lists, study/meeting notes, business and work plans, office aids, labels, messages, lists, web pages, QR codes and records. Suitable for various applications such as office, home, students, children, amateur archivists, busy moms and more. It also makes a great gift for children during the holidays, Christmas, New Year and birthdays.

[Inkless portable mini printer] The photo printer measures 82*82*45 mm, weighs only 210 grams, and can be carried in pockets and bags. Print easily anytime, anywhere, and can recognize text, pictures, tables, emoticons, QR codes, etc.

[Different paper roll gifts] The product includes two rolls of white paper, three rolls of colored paper (blue, pink, yellow), and one roll of self-adhesive paper. Our mini printer enables you to create colorful and adorable patterns. Whether for crafting, scrapbooking, or just adding a personal touch to your items, this printer is the ultimate teaching playmate for your children and a creative tool for anyone looking for inspiration.

[Wireless bluetooth link easy installation] The first step is to search, download and install the "Tiny Print" application on the App Store or Google.The second step is to long press the printer switch, the green light flashes, turn on the Bluetooth device of the mobile phone, open the "Tiny Print" application and click "Connect", refresh and click "X5" and connect.

[Packaging and after-sales service] 1 mini thermal printer + 5 rolls of printing paper + 1 USB cable + 1 user manual. The portable printer has a built-in 1200mAh battery for long-lasting use. Fully charge before use. If there is any problem, we promise to return it free of charge within 3 months.
body.description: Mini Pocket Printer, Bluetooth Smart Pocket Inkless Thermal Printer, Portable Sticker Printer with 5 Roll Papers for Journal/DIY Scrapbook/Travel/Notes/Lists/Label/Memo, Receipt Printer for Children Women Gifts for iOS&Android

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good print quality for the size
reviews.reviewText: Just bought the Notebuddy Mini printer as a gift for my 12-year-old and it's been a huge hit! This little printer is so neat – it's tiny enough to fit in a backpack, but still does an awesome job printing labels for all sorts of stuff. My kid has been having a blast labeling school supplies, books, and even made labels for a DIY project. It's super easy to use; it connects right to a phone or tablet with Bluetooth, and no mess with ink because it's thermal. The print quality is really good for its size. It was so easy to set up, even my 12-year-old had it figured out in no time. Definitely a cool gift if you're looking for something unique and practical for a tech-savvy kid!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for school Diagrams
reviews.reviewText: This has been a favorite gift for the kids to use for school notes and diagrams or drawings they can share. It prints very well and it is easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and makes homework a little more fun!
reviews.reviewText: We use this for little images the kids find for school that they would like to add to their notes but do not want to write every detail themselves. The kids just take a picture of the information and then they print it out and we glue or tape into their notebook. I love that there is no ink to replace. One less thing to have to remember to buy. The kids actually LOOK FORWARD to adding something neat to their notes now so they can use the TINY PRINT. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Confusing but great!
reviews.reviewText: I was all prepared to leave a one star review. The product states that it is a sticker paper mini photo printer. However it is loaded with "receipt" paper, it comes with 5 rolls, 4 of them receipt paper, one of them actual sticker paper. It took several trys to get it connected but it finally connected. Once I realized it actually had sticker paper I was a lot more please but I am still frustrated that I needed to order more sticker paper upon arrival. The photo printer and app is really cool for what it is. I like that it is pre loaded with imagines and clip art that is useful like, to do list, post it notes, picture icons, etc. What I would like to see uploaded are numbers in perhaps a fancy font or a way to change the font for words. What I don't like is the inconsistency of print intervals, waisted room and the paper is used up pretty quickly. I thought the thermal images, what prints, were fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I needed. I use it both for home and work. Works well and app is easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest little printer
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. The pictures aren’t 100% clear, but I wouldn’t expect them to be. It is perfect for printing little quotes and notes for school.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible picture quality
reviews.reviewText: I was giving these as gifts for Christmas. I wanted them to be able to play right away. So I charged one and connected it. It was simple, but the picture quality was so bad. I returned them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works as shown, bought this for myself and my daughter, love it!! Great for school projects, general art projects and organizing!!!
